    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [Given]                                 1         5
    [I]                                     7         7
    [have]                                  9         12
    [a]                                     14        14
    [lot]                                   16        18
    [to]                                    20        21
    [say:]                                  23        26
    [\n]                                    27        27
L2
    ["""\n One\n Two\n Three\n """]         1         4
L6
    [\n]                                    5         5
EOF
